subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Donnie Walsh will probably be running the Knicks soon. And N.B.A. Commissioner David Stern is optimistic about the Knicks. But Stern insists the two things are not necessarily related.
snippet: Donnie Walsh will probably be running the Knicks soon. And N.B.A. Commissioner David Stern is optimistic about the Knicks. But Stern insists the two things are not necessarily related.
